doc:
Bob Bell (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bob_Bell_(actor) 0 Robert Lewis Bell (January 18, 1922 – December 8, 1997), better known as Bob Bell, was an American announcer and actor famous for his alter-ego, Bozo the Clown. He was the original portrayer of the character for Chicago superstation WGN-TV. Robert_Lewis_Bell ( January_18_,_1922 – December_8_,_1997 ) , better_known as Bob_Bell , was an_American_announcer_and_actor_famous for his_alter-ego , Bozo the_Clown . He was the_original_portrayer of the_character for Chicago_superstation_WGN-TV .
